column1: Kata Robata////The service was quite poor at times. Some of us had special 'Father's Day' inserts in our menu. Well
column2: we were there on Father's day and looked over these special menus. We ordered something off one of them and were told we shouldn't have those menus
column3: that they were old. We explained to the waitress that they said Father's Day. She seemed perplexed and wandered off. Â She was semi-perplexed the whole night.
